OOC: no prob, rampage was trying to get away from Epyon by 
blasting him with his electro-gun, i'll just post from here.

::Rampage/Divebomb::
Rampage's armour was dented and wearing down. He landed and 
stumbled, a little dizzy. The rage still held him, so he continued, 
running toward Cheetor, the next image of a moving object that 
gets through the red haze which is Rampage's eyes. He transforms 
into Predacon (G1) mode and begins to sprint towards Cheetor, 
firing his four machineguns rapidly.

Divebomb turns around, afters circling with a large radius, towards 
the CF, and starts heading back.
